managed_creds.title: Managed Credentials in Activeloop (optional, advanced)
managed_creds.description: Credentials that would be used for accessing remote images

overwrite_tensor_definitions.title: Overwrite tensor definitions (optional)
overwrite_tensor_definitions.description: If tensor definition written, then it would overwrite upon creation

neglected_tensors.title: Neglected Tensors (optional)
neglected_tensors.description: Tensor names specified here will be neglected after transformation happens

custom_transform.title: Custom Transformation (optional, advanced)
custom_transform.description: Custom python row-wise transformation as a dictionary. If column name is not specified then it will assume 1:1 mapping. For each tensor added make sure to have definition overwritten.
